Package languageTools.program.agent.dependencygraph

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionSpecificationGraphGenerator
    ExpressionGraphGenerator for ActionSpecifications.
    DependencyGraph<T extends Expression>
    A DependencyGraph consists of a set of Nodes, where each node represents an expression from the KR language used.
    DependencyGraphGenerator<T>
    Basic structure for creating a dependency graph.
    GOALProgramGraphGenerator
    DependencyGraph generator for GOALPrograms.
    ModuleGraphGenerator
    DependencyGraph generator for Modules.
    Node<T extends Expression>
    A Node is used to store expressions from the KRlanguage that the agent uses in a DependencyGraph.
    RuleGraphGenerator
    DependencyGraph generator for Rules.
